# fmc_ftd_nat_policies (Resource)

Resource for NAT Policies in FMC

## Example
An example is shown below: 
```hcl
resource "fmc_ftd_nat_policies" "nat_policy" {
    name = "Terraform NAT Policy"
    description = "New NAT policy!"
}
```
